channel.title: [562] Need help with client
channel.description:
When i run a 562 server 2 things can happen depending on which client i use. If i use one client i cant connect to 127.0.0.1 even tho i should be able to. if i run another one i can log in but when i start walking my character ends up walking in a diagonal line straight trough objects. I have no idea how to fix both of these problems. anyone can help? No i am not a noob. if i run a server and it says listening on port 43594 that means i can connect trough localhost no matter what.
also i tried 5 diffrent clients and 4 servers all 562. it ended up in one of those problems stated above. hope anyone can help! thanks in advance!

item.title: [562] Need help with client
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Well. I remember this happening to me haha! All I did was not use 562 and instead used 525

Read full topic
